items.title: Asset-backed finance is growing fast and drawing new scrutiny
items.description: ABF involves lending against a specific asset, income stream, or loan rather than lending to a company based on its cash flow.

items.title: Inside the $6 trillion ABF loan market: Here's what to know
items.description: CNBC's Robert Frank joins 'Squawk Box' with the latest news.

items.title: Tax impact on wealth giving season: Here's what to know
items.description: Changes to U.S. tax law could lead to a surge in charitable giving this year. CNBC's Robert Frank joins 'Squawk Box' with the details.

items.title: Manhattan condo values fell over the past decade. Here's why rents are still rising
items.description: More wealthy New Yorkers are choosing to rent as condos lose value in Manhattan.

items.title: Why Manhattan condos are selling at a loss
items.description: 1 of 3 condos recently sold in Manhattan sold at a loss according to luxury real estate firm Brown Harris Stevens. Over the past 10 years, condo value...
